mapper.sql: a.proc_sno AS "procSno", a.id AS "id", a.form_id AS "formId", a.data_secret_level AS "dataSecretLevel", a.version AS "version", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_by_dept AS "createByDept.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.shenqingren AS "shenqingren", a.shenqingshijian AS "shenqingshijian", a.shenqingbumen AS "shenqingbumen", a.renyuanmiji AS "renyuanmiji", a.swyzyt AS "swyzyt", a.shenqingrenid AS "shenqingrenid", a.shenqingbumenid AS "shenqingbumenid", a.yonghuid AS "yonghuid"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO efm_gzqzbjbeei( proc_sno, id, form_id, data_secret_level, version, create_by, create_by_dept, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, shenqingren, shenqingshijian, shenqingbumen, renyuanmiji, swyzyt, shenqingrenid, shenqingbumenid, yonghuid ) VALUES ( #{procSno}, #{id}, #{formId}, #{dataSecretLevel}, #{version}, #{createBy.id}, #{createByDept.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{shenqingren}, #{shenqingshijian}, #{shenqingbumen}, #{renyuanmiji}, #{swyzyt}, #{shenqingrenid}, #{shenqingbumenid}, #{yonghuid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE efm_gzqzbjbeei SET proc_sno = #{procSno}, form_id = #{formId}, data_secret_level = #{dataSecretLevel}, version = #{version}, create_by_dept = #{createByDept.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, shenqingren = #{shenqingren}, shenqingshijian = #{shenqingshijian}, shenqingbumen = #{shenqingbumen}, renyuanmiji = #{renyuanmiji}, swyzyt = #{swyzyt}, shenqingrenid = #{shenqingrenid}, shenqingbumenid = #{shenqingbumenid}, yonghuid = #{yonghuid} WHERE id = #{id}
